gurmukhi: ਸ੍ਰੀ ਗੁਰ ਦਰਸ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਸ੍ਰੀ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਸਸਤ੍ਰ ਸਨਾਹ ਪੰਚ ਦੂਤ ਬਸਿ ਅਾੲੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Sree Gur Daras Dhiaan Sree Gur Sabada , Giaan Sasatr Sanaah Panch Doot Basi Aaay Hai ?
translation: Contemplating on the vision of the True Guru and practicing His impressed divine word are the weapons for fighting the five evils like lust, anger, avarice etc.

gurmukhi: ਸ੍ਰੀ ਗੁਰ ਚਰਨ ਰੇਨ ਸ੍ਰੀ ਗੁਰ ਸਰਨਿ ਧੇਨ ਕਰਮ ਭਰਮ ਕਟਿ ਅਭੈ ਪਦ ਪਾੲੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Sree Gur Charan Rayn Sree Gur Sarani Dhayna , Karam Bharam Kati Abhai Pad Paaay Hai ?
translation: The refuge of True Guru and by living in the dust of His feet, the ill effects and doubts of all past performed deeds are vanquished. One acquires a state of fearlessness.

gurmukhi: ਸ੍ਰੀ ਗੁਰ ਬਚਨ ਲੇਖ ਸ੍ਰੀ ਗੁਰ ਸੇਵਕ ਭੇਖ ਅਛਲ ਅਲੇਖ ਪ੍ਰਭੁ ਅਲਖ ਲਖਾੲੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Sree Gur Bachan Laykh Sree Gur Sayvak Bhaykha , Achhal Alaykh Prabhu Alakh Lakhaaay Hai ?
translation: By imbibing the divine words of Satguru (True Guru), and by developing an attitude of a true slave, one realises the imperceptible, indeceivable and indescribable Lord.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਸਾਧਸੰਗ ਗੋਸਟਿ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਪ੍ਰਸੰਗ ਨਿੰਮ੍ਰਤਾ ਨਿਰੰਤਰੀ ਕੈ ਸਹਜ ਸਮਾੲੇ ਹੈ ||੧੩੫||
transliteration: Gursikh Saadhasang Gosati Praym Prasanga , Ninmrataa Nirantaree Kai Sahaj Samaaay Hai ?135?
translation: In the company of holy men of the True Guru, singing Gurbani (Guru's utterances in praise of the Lord) with humility and love, one gets absorbed in the spiritual peace. (135)
